sentences.en: a posthumous collection of his articles
Dead men hear no tales; posthumous fame an Irish bull.
sentences.cn: 死人无耳, 死后的名声等于风马牛.

sentences.en: Dear men hear no tales, posthumous fame is an irish bull.
sentences.cn: 死人无耳, 死后的名胜等于风马牛.

sentences.en: Eleven states explicitly allow recognition of a parent - child relationship that begins with posthumous conception.
sentences.cn: 11个州明确承认始于死后受孕的父母 — 子女关系.

sentences.en: He received a posthumous award for bravery.
sentences.cn: 他表现勇敢,死后受到了嘉奖.

sentences.en: He was awarded a posthumous Victoria Cross.
sentences.cn: 他被追授了一枚维多利亚十字勋章.

sentences.en: Heath Ledger won a posthumous Oscar for supporting actor for The Dark Knight.
sentences.cn: 已故演员希斯·莱杰以《黑暗骑士》赢得最佳男配角奖.

sentences.en: I know what I am writing now is similar to a posthumous paper.
sentences.cn: 我知道我现在写的内容和一封遗书差不多.

sentences.en: It can take innumerable forms, from buffoonery to the pursuit of posthumous fame.
sentences.cn: 它可以有无数表现形式, 从插科打挥到追求死后的名声.

sentences.en: It was calculated to secure for his book a name , and for himself posthumous fame.
sentences.cn: 他是打算靠了这一点使他的著作问世以后能哄动一时, 使他自己能扬名后世的.

sentences.en: Postumer Posthumous discoveries of Mozart works are rare but not unknown.
sentences.cn: 莫扎特死后被发现的作品稀少但并非不为人知.

sentences.en: The legendary actor received a posthumous achievement award.
sentences.cn: 这位传奇男星在过世后获得终身成就奖的肯定.

sentences.en: The posthumous titles honored his death in a way.
sentences.cn: 被追认了几个头衔的他得以略享哀荣.

sentences.en: Today awarded posthumous Order of Conspicuous Merit , Second Class.
sentences.cn: 由于功勋卓著, 今天授予二等功.

words.tran_cn: 于死后，于身后；于著作者死后出版地

trans.tran_cn: 死后的，遗腹的，死后出生的，作者死后出版的
trans.tran_en: happening, printed etc after someone’s death
